My current position is (2, 7).
The closest apple to me is at (1, 8), which is one tile to the left and one tile up from my current position.
To get to that apple, I should move LEFT first to get to (1, 7), and then UP to get to (1, 8).

Moving LEFT first will position me closer to the other apples at (1, 4) and (1, 9), giving me more options to move efficiently in the future.

The enemy snake #2 is far away at (6, 0), so I don't need to worry about them for now.
